titleStmt.title: The Psalter of Dauid newely translated into Englysh metre in such sort that it maye the more decently, and wyth more delyte of the mynde, be reade and songe of al men. Wherunto is added a note of four partes, wyth other thynges, as shall appeare in the epistle to the readar.
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Crowley.
titleStmt.author: Crowley, Robert, 1518?-1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: Translated and imprinted by [R. Grafton and S. Mierdman for] Robert Crowley in the yere of our Lorde. M.D.xlix. the xx. daye of September. And are to be solde in Eley rentes in Holburne. Cum priuilegio ad impremendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Actual printers' names from STC; "Grafton pr[inted]. the prelims.".
First four leaves printed in red and black.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the yere of our Lorde. M.D.xlix. the xx. daye of September. And are to be solde in Eley rentes in Holburne. Cum priuilegio ad impremendum solum
